channel.title: How do i change home?
channel.description: Hey people how do i change the home in my 562 server cause the one i am in really is stupid. Thanks

item.title: How do i change home?
item.dc:creator: @catscapepkz catscapepkz
item.description:
@catscapepkz wrote:

To change home find a location and note the coordinates of it.
Then open up your commandpackethandler’s Search home and change the coords to your new home’s coords. To get coords type coords in the admin panel where you are standing
Then open up entity.java and search for the coords of the old home
Change them to the coords of the new home
That makes players when they login spawn at new home.
Then finally open deathevent.java and change the coords for where you die in there to the new home.
If i need to restate anything please tell me :o
Thanks

Read full topic
